price: (17) This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today! Indeed, Allāh is swift in account.
arabic: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡۚ لَا ظُلۡمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: al-yawma tuj'zā kullu nafsin bimā kasabat lā ẓul'ma al-yawma inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
